member.name: TCP_ESTATS_FINE_RTT_ROD_v0
member.summary: The TCP_ESTATS_FINE_RTT_ROD_v0 structure contains read-only dynamic information for extended TCP statistics on fine-grained round-trip time (RTT) estimation for a TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_FINE_RTT_ROD_v0.RttVar
member.summary: The round trip time variation, in microseconds, used in receive window auto-tuning when the TCP extended statistics feature is enabled.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_FINE_RTT_ROD_v0.MaxRtt
member.summary: The maximum sampled round trip time, in microseconds.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_FINE_RTT_ROD_v0.MinRtt
member.summary: The minimum sampled round trip time, in microseconds.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_FINE_RTT_ROD_v0.SumRtt
member.summary: A smoothed value round trip time, in microseconds, computed from all sampled round trip times. The smoothing is a weighted additive function that uses the RttVar member.
